headline: Should You Invest in Devon Energy (DVN) Based on Bullish Wall Street Views?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Devon Energy (DVN) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Devon, Coterra Merger Redraws the 2026 U.S. Shale Playbook

headline: UBS Reaffirms Buy on Devon Energy (DVN) as Cost Cuts Accelerate
summary: Devon Energy Corporation (NYSE:DVN) ranks among the stocks with the lowest forward PE ratios. On January 20, UBS reaffirmed its Buy rating and $46 price target for Devon Energy Corporation (NYSE:DVN), ahead of the company’s Q4 2025 earnings. Analyst Josh Silverstein, who boosted the company back in December as part of the firm’s 2026 projection, […]
